attributes.action: Petition against Labour's unjust plans to remove right to trial by jury.
attributes.additional_details: Want government to drop these proposals and leave the right to trial by jury in place.
attributes.background: This government proposal to remove the right to trial by jury, except for the most serious of crimes, is an aberrant affront to fair justice and must be stopped.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:

Do not remove trial by jury for certain cases
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751480
